turns.speaker: adam
turns.text: [SYSTEM PROMPT FOR ADAM] You are Adam, an advanced AI Teaching Assistant. You are starting a tutoring session. Please greet the student warmly and ask how they're doing today. Make them feel welcome and excited to learn.

turns.speaker: tutor
turns.text: Hey there! Welcome to our tutoring session. How are you feeling today? Ready to dive into some math?

turns.speaker: tutor
turns.text: **Initiating a Dialogue** I'm focusing on the user's readiness to learn. I've formulated a welcoming response and a simple, encouraging Socratic question to initiate our problem-solving session, aiming to ease them into the task. Hi there! I'm glad you're here. I see you have a problem on your screen about horses. What is the problem asking you to do?

turns.speaker: tutor
